message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer ensures you get a good chunk now.
I understand you want a larger share, Alice, but this split is fairer considering the inflation working against me.
Bob, time is ticking and we both lose with every round. I'm meeting you halfway - let's close this deal.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise, but the deal needs to reflect the faster rate of inflation impacting my share.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Take this offer before inflation eats away even more of your potential gain!
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option considering the circumstances. Let's end this.
